entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. A few showers beginning after midnight except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
